StringListProperty.Name: IncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for include files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable INCLUDE.

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryPath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for library files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable LIB.

StringProperty.Name: ClangPath
StringProperty.Description: Specify the directory where the Clang compiler and toolchain executables reside in. See http://clang.llvm.org/. By default the environment variable CLANG_BIN is read.

StringProperty.Name: EmccPath
StringProperty.Description: Specify the directory where the emcc linker resides in. See https://github.com/kripken/emscripten. By default the environment variable EMSCRIPTEN is read.
